description: This table contains data elements submitted for CMS ESRD patient vaccination form.

columns.name: REGISTRY_DATA_ID
columns.description: The unique identifier for the registry data record.

columns.name: DLYS_VACCINE_TYPE_C_NAME
columns.description:
This item is used in dialysis regulatory reporting. It stores a dialysis patient's vaccination type.


May contain organization-specific values: Yes


 Category Entries: 


Pneumococcal


Influenza


Hepatitis B

columns.name: DLYS_VACCINE_STATUS_C_NAME
columns.description:
This item is used in dialysis regulatory reporting. It stores a dialysis patient's vaccination received status.


May contain organization-specific values: Yes


 Category Entries: 


Facility


Another Facility


Not Received

columns.name: DLYS_VACCINE_SUBTYPE_C_NAME
columns.description:
This item is used in dialysis regulatory reporting. It stores a dialysis patient's vaccination name.


May contain organization-specific values: Yes


 Category Entries: 


Pneumococcal conjugate vaccine (Prevnar 13)


Vaxneuvance (Prevnar 15)


Pneumococcal conjugate vaccine (Prevnar 20)


Pneumococcal polysaccharide vaccine (Pneumovax23)


Fluarix (IIV4)


FluLaval (IIV4)


Flublok (RIV4)


Fluzone (IIV4)


Fluzone High-Dose Quad (IIV4-HD)


Afluria Quad (IIV4)


Fluad (aIIV3)


Fluad Quad (aIIV4)


Flucelvax (ccIIV4)


Heplisav-B


Recombivax HB


Engerix-B


Unknown

columns.name: RECEIVED_DATE
columns.description: This item is used in dialysis regulatory reporting. It stores a dialysis patient's vaccination received date.

columns.name: RECEIVED_DATE_APPROX_YN
columns.description:
This item is used in dialysis regulatory reporting. It stores whether a dialysis patient's vaccination received date is approximate.


May contain organization-specific values: No


 Category Entries: 


No


Yes

columns.name: ADVERSE_REACT_STATUS_C_NAME
columns.description:
This item is used in dialysis regulatory reporting. It stores whether a dialysis patient had an adverse reaction from the vaccination.


May contain organization-specific values: No


 Category Entries: 


Yes


No


Unknown

columns.name: ADVERSE_REACT_COMMENT
columns.description: This item is used in dialysis regulatory reporting. It stores comments about an adverse reaction that a dialysis patient had from the vaccination.

columns.name: ADVERSE_REACT_FDA_REPORTED_C_NAME
columns.description:
This item is used in dialysis regulatory reporting. It stores whether a dialysis patient's vaccination adverse reaction was reported to the FDA.


 The category values for this column were already listed for column: ADVERSE_REACT_STATUS_C_NAME

columns.name: DLYS_HEPB_DOSE_TYPE_C_NAME
columns.description:
This item is used in dialysis regulatory reporting. It stores whether a dialysis patient's hepatitis B vaccination dose is part of a series or a booster.


May contain organization-specific values: Yes


 Category Entries: 


Series


Booster


Unknown

columns.name: DLYS_VACCIN_NT_RCV_RSN_C_NAME
columns.description:
This item is used in dialysis regulatory reporting. It stores a dialysis patient's vaccination not received reason.


May contain organization-specific values: Yes


 Category Entries: 


Medical Reason - Allergic or Adverse Reaction


Declined - Religious/Philosophical


Declined - Without Explanation


Other


Series Completed per Antibody Test Result

columns.name: VACCINE_NT_RCV_CMT
columns.description: This item is used in dialysis regulatory reporting. It stores a dialysis patient's vaccination not received reason comments.

columns.name: OFFERED_DATE
columns.description: This item is used in dialysis regulatory reporting. It stores the date when the vaccination was offered to a dialysis patient.

columns.name: OFFERED_DATE_APPROX_YN
columns.description:
This item is used in dialysis regulatory reporting. It stores whether a dialysis patient's vaccination offered date is approximate.


 The category values for this column were already listed for column: RECEIVED_DATE_APPROX_YN

columns.name: HEPB_ANTIHBS_STATUS_C_NAME
columns.description:
This item is used in dialysis regulatory reporting. It stores whether a dialysis patient received a hepatitis B antibody test.


 The category values for this column were already listed for column: ADVERSE_REACT_STATUS_C_NAME

columns.name: ANTIHBS_VALUE
columns.description: This item is used in dialysis regulatory reporting. It stores a dialysis patient's hepatitis B antibodies test result value.

columns.name: ANTIHBS_DATE
columns.description: This item is used in dialysis regulatory reporting. It stores a dialysis patient's hepatitis B antibodies test date.
